content: as some fun eyeball coasters to your decor with this quick and easy pattern a great gift for lovers of all things spooky the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found ** here 1 ** on my blog **materials** * dk weight cotton yarn * 3mm crochet hook * yarn needle scissors the finished item measure approximately 3 5 x 3 5 9cm x 9cm item size may vary depending on the materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/halloween-eyeball-coaster-pattern/
